name: A very sus night at Freddy's
name_original: A very sus night at Freddy's
description:
You got hired for a job at Freddy Fazbear's to do what ever the task is required by the one and only Phone guy and he is definitely not an imposter do what he says complete his task and kill him in this game for free

Controlswalkwasdrunshiftjumpspacecrouchctrlflashlightftoggle on & off to make some of the animatronics go awayfoxy maskctoggle on to make make one of the animatronics go awayinteractefire cannon ball in minigameSpace

This game is also on gamejolt and indiedb
